title: PM briefed about Saudi financial assistance, oil facility on deferred payments
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 29 (APP): Advisor to PM on Finance Shaukat Tarin called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Monday and briefed him about the financial assistance from Saudi Arabia as well as the oil facility on deferred payments.
The Prime Minister was also apprised of the progress on revenue receipts.
During the meeting, matters relating to the dividends paid by the Public Sector Enterprises (PSEs) were also discussed.
